explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue hoodie is in a room, holding two small soccer balls in his right hand and gripping the cuff of his right sleeve with his left hand. His mouth is open, with a small soccer ball inside. There is a table with drawers in the room, with various items on it, and a black stand next to the table. In the lower right corner, a man in an orange shirt and glasses is looking at his phone in his right hand.

[0-8] The man in blue puts the balls in his right hand into his sleeve, closes his mouth, and pulls down his cuff, revealing 4 small balls inside. He then opens his mouth, takes out a ball with his right hand, puts it down, takes out another ball, and repeats the action, taking out a total of 5 balls from his mouth. The man in orange in the lower right corner looks at his phone with his mouth wide open in a shocked expression. The scene then cuts to the man in orange, who is in a room with geometric patterns on the wall, holding a cup full of small yellow balls in his right hand, his left hand on his chin with his thumb and index finger extended.
